ratings.comment: Ann was awesome! I took calc in highschool and did terribly. She was so clear with all of the material and definitely willing to help anyone who needed it. Because of her, I understood calculus so much better and was able to almost always pull out an A. Definitely try to take this class with her.

Easily one of the best Calc 2 teachers at UW. I would highly recommend anyone taking a math class to try to get her as the teacher. Exams are very straight forward. Pay attention in class and do the homework.

Scheels is an good professor with easy exams. It was nice to have a professor who I could clearly understand and who told us what to expect for the exams instead of trying to trick us. She doesn't test your "cleverness" (her words). I would take her again in a heartbeat for any other math course here. Great experience.

Ann is the best prof for calculus at UW, period. I dreaded this class before the semester and now I actually miss doing calculus problems. She lets you know EXACTLY what you need for exams, and doesn't try to trick you with stuff you've never seen. I'd take her again in a heartbeat for any math class at UW.

She was very easy to understand, but she made a lot of mistakes when she did problems during lecture. Gave an awesome review for the final (I got a 97.5!). Go to lecture and DO THE HOMEWORK! It really helps.

Ann is a wonderful professor! She used to be a math tutor and you can tell, as she is a really great teacher. Her grading is very fair and before each tests she goes through a 'laundry list' which tells you EXACTLY what will be on the exam! So helpful for studying. Keep up on homework, and go to office hrs. Take her if you can!
Ann is the dopest prof EVER. She makes this class interesting and is SOOOOO helpful with exams. Ann Scheels is freaking AWESOME!

Awesome Professor! Her lectures are very clear and helps you understand things very well! Plus her quizzes and exams are very reasonable and she makes sure you understand what will be on expected on the upcoming tests. Take her!
very good professor. fair. explains things well. she tells you whats on the tests...so, its bearable.RECOMMEND
Very clear! Her exams generally stick to what was covered. Quizzes are very easy if you do the homework.

She teaches everything really clearly so it's easy to understand. Tests aren't hard if you have done the homework and gone to lectures. She makes some mistakes in lecture but usually they aren't that bad and she fixes them. Take her! Calculus seems easy when she teaches it!
Never had calc before and got an A with Ann. If you pay attention, do hw, ect you should have no problem. She does not do anything unexpected on exams.

Ann explains concepts extremely well in lecture. I found her to be extremely helpful. Her exams are fairly easy if you do the practice exams and study for them. Taking her class has made me actually understand calculus!

Exams were excessively difficult and unrelated to the material taught.  Very often would stop mid-lecture to figure out what she was talking about. Long story short, she seems far too inexperienced and disconnected with her students, despite what may be said about her office hours.
Very helpful in office hours.  Lectures clear.  Exams were difficult, but fair with no surprises.
